backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the MOBIUS-NOVA backend that handles four types of form submissions: test site applications, investor inquiries, partnership inquiries, and general inquiries, storing each in separate Maps with generated IDs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that defines the old and new actor state shapes and initializes empty Maps for all four inquiry/application types during canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs to their titles, associated source files, component dependencies, and test IDs for the MOBIUS-NOVA landing page build.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and content, serving as a reference index for all components, pages, hooks, and config files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used by shadcn-ui components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the MOBIUS-NOVA app that sets the page title, imports Montserrat (400 and 700) from Google Fonts, and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with five routes (/, /about, /technology, /features, /contact) and renders the RouterProvider.
Empty file placeholder for the BenefitsSection component.
frontend/src/components/CallToActionSect: Empty file placeholder for the CallToActionSection component.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentsSecti: Deployments section component rendering a 2Ã—2 responsive grid of product render cards (Off-Grid Cabin, Farm, Mars Colony, CAD Detail) with images, Nova Gold titles, descriptions, and Cosmic Blue badges.
Empty file placeholder for the FeaturesSection component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with the brand logo, tagline, social media icon links, quick navigation links that smooth-scroll to page sections, and a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/FounderExpertise: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/GetInvolvedSecti: Renders a dual-form section for investor and partner contact submissions, with validation, loading/success/error states, and dropdowns for investment range and partnership type.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the full-screen hero section with the company logo, tagline, headline, CTA buttons linking to investor and test-site sections, and a scroll-down indicator.
frontend/src/components/InvestorOpportun: Renders the investor opportunity section with four value-proposition cards (market, technology, timing, IP), investment tier details, and a CTA button scrolling to the contact form.
Displays a grid of engineering specifications (power output, dimensions, bearing system, energy modes, ROI timeline) for the Frictionless Power Core with a disclaimer note.
frontend/src/components/TechnologySectio: Renders the technology section showcasing two infographic images of the Frictionless Power Core and engineering analysis, plus three feature callout cards covering multi-modal core, frictionless bearings, and advanced materials.
React component rendering a form section for users to apply as early test sites for the MOBIUS-NOVA system, with fields for contact info, property type, and energy sources, plus validation and submission state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactSubmissions: Custom hook providing submit and reset functions with loading/success/error state for both investor and partnership inquiry form submissions via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module noting that React Query hooks for backend integration exist in other files; exports nothing.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestSiteSubmission: Custom hook that handles submitting a test site application to the backend actor, managing loading, success, and error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining MOBIUS-NOVA brand CSS custom properties (colors, backgrounds) and Tailwind utility classes for brand colors, gradients, and shadows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page component displaying MOBIUS-NOVA's mission, values, and team information with a hero section, mission statement, and styled content cards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page for MOBIUS-NOVA with a hero section, a controlled contact form (name, email, company, message), and contact info cards displaying mail, phone, and location details.
frontend/src/pages/FeaturesPage.tsx: Features page listing eight capability cards (e.g., Multi-Modal Single Core, Scalable Architecture, Smart Monitoring) with icons, descriptions, and the site's dark space theme.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Root landing page that composes all major section components (Hero, Technology, Deployments, KeySpecs, InvestorOpportunity, TestSite, GetInvolved, Footer) in order.
frontend/src/pages/TechnologyPage.tsx: Dedicated technology page with a full-bleed hero image, a 'How It Works' grid explaining wind and hydro energy capture, and additional technical detail sections using the brand's dark theme.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom brand colors (deep-space-black, nova-gold, cosmic-blue, liquid-silver), Montserrat font family, container settings, accordion animations, and plugins (typography, container-queries, animate).
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 3) documenting MOBIUS-NOVA's brand guidelines, architectural notes, existing features, known issues, and required/edited image assets for the investor-facing landing page.
